item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Timemap.org – Interactive Map of History (117 points | 29 comments)
2. A ChatGPT clone, in 3000 bytes of C, backed by GPT-2 (2023) (255 points | 91 comments)
3. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (605 points | 217 comments)
4. Certain names make ChatGPT grind to a halt, and we know why (162 points | 89 comments)
5. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (821 points | 417 comments)
6. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (330 points | 520 comments)
7. Infracost (YC W21) Is Hiring a Founding Solutions Engineer (Remote) ( | hide)
8. Run Database in GitHub Actions, Persisting Data to S3, and Access It Publicly (57 points | 39 comments)
9. 12,419 days of Strandbeest evolution [video] (42 points | 2 comments)
10. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (138 points | 23 comments)
11. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (199 points | 39 comments)
12. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (395 points | 138 comments)
13. Review of Mullvad VPN (368 points | 136 comments)
14. The report for the 2024 security audit of the Mullvad app is now available (11 points | discuss)
15. Parkinson's Law: It’s real, so use it (61 points | 49 comments)
16. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (273 points | 356 comments)
17. Startup will brick $800 emotional support robot for kids without refunds (34 points | 22 comments)
18. Tricking c64 basic into clearing a hi-res screen quickly (46 points | 11 comments)
19. The Cold Email Handbook (245 points | 126 comments)
20. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (227 points | 43 comments)
21. The Marvelous Disappearing Capacitor (28 points | 5 comments)
22. Dear OAuth Providers (273 points | 75 comments)
23. The GPU is not always faster (162 points | 82 comments)
24. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (111 points | 64 comments)
25. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (148 points | 80 comments)
26. The Myth of Bananaland (139 points | 98 comments)
27. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (243 points | 96 comments)
28. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (350 points | 218 comments)
29. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (141 points | 44 comments)
30. Deciphering C++ compiler errors: Nonsensical errors from a function declaration (27 points | 14 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 12:35 PM UTC
